Package de.uzk.hki.da.convert

Main converison functions and actions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLIConversionStrategy
    The Class CLIConversionStrategy.
    CLIFormatIdentifier
    Depends on a script that returns a comma separated list of puids for any given file.
    ConverterService
    Helps converting files based on lists of ConversionInstructions.
    DocxConversionStrategy
    The Class DocxConversionStrategy.
    FormatScanService
    Provides funcionalities for adding file format information to DAFile objects.
    JhoveScanService
    Returns Jhove metadata for a given file.
    PdfConversionStrategy
    LZA Conversion Strategy for PDF Files.
    PdfService
    Adds PDF Functions of Apache PDFBox to DA-NRW.
    PublishAudioConversionStrategy
    The Class PublishAudioConversionStrategy.
    PublishCLIConversionStrategy
    The Class PublishCLIConversionStrategy.
    PublishConversionStrategyBase  
    PublishImageConversionStrategy
    tested by PublishImageConversionStrategyTest.
    PublishPDFConversionStrategy
    Converts PDF files for the presentation layer.
    PublishVideoConversionStrategy
    The Class PublishVideoConversionStrategy
    PublishXSLTConversionStrategy
    The Class PublishXSLTConversionStrategy.
    TiffConversionStrategy
    Scans a Tiff file for compression and in case a compression has been detected it converts the file to a non-compressed version.
